name: many-words
description: A WebApp to help you learn foreign languages vocabulary

scripts.build_and_move: cd client && npm run build && cd ../tools && node insert_build.js
scripts.counter: cd tools && npm run word_counter && cd .. && npm run lint:web-app-exercises && npm run lint:server-exercises
scripts.docker:dev-detached: docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml up --build --detach && npm run logs
scripts.docker:prod: npm run set-prod-env && docker-compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build
scripts.docker:prod-detached: npm run set-prod-env && docker-compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build --detach && npm run logs
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../tools && npm install
scripts.logs: gnome-terminal --tab -t web-app -- docker logs manywords-web-app -f ; gnome-terminal --tab -t server -- docker logs manywords-server -f ; gnome-terminal --tab -t mongo -- docker logs  manywords-mongo -f ; gnome-terminal --tab -t database-seeder -- docker logs manywords-database-seeder -f

author: Camille HAGENBOURGER
